title: The Gary Null Show
content:
Newsmaker:  Monsanto Rider snuck into the Agriculture Appropriations Bill in order to further the GMO agenda against... <!--more--> organic farming Prof Tony Pereira teaches chemical engineering at the Fuel Center Research Center and College of Engineering at Lamar University in Beaumont Texas, where he specializes in solar technology Tony is a long time activist for energy, healthy and safe natural produce, and environmental causes and is the founder of the Institute for Sustainable Engineering.
The Institute brings engineers, scientists and researchers together to educate and plan for transitions towards a sustainable society through international academic and public partnerships.
CALL TO ACTION: At the Organic Consumers Association website: www.OrganicConsumers.
org New time slot for The Smart Show with host Cary Harrison Cary Harrison is a longtime radio host and activist broadcaster, heard in Los Angeles and nationawide on Think Green Radio and TV.
His program – The Smart Show – will now be aired on the Progressive Radio Network every Monday evening at 6:00 pm Eastern, 3:00 pm Pacific.
Cary conducts exciting interviews and call-ins with well known politicos and celebrities exploring the interface between pop culture and politics.
